entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
